title: Best of The Program | 4/6/20
description:
In today’s COVID-19 update, the surgeon general warned Americans that this week may be our coronavirus “Pearl Harbor” moment, we’re using fewer hospital beds than predicted, and the New York Times has a shocking claim about U.S. deaths. But Glenn has a warning for Americans: The proposed coronavirus “cure” is nothing short of socialism and slavery to global collectivism. And does the Constitution designate gun shops and places of worship as “essential”?
